ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Toth,Bernie Wrightson,Alex Toth,Jack Sparling,Bernie Wrightson
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Turn of the Wheel!: Villagers steal Klaus the Cruel's favorite torture device, a wheel, from his castle. Over the following days the wheel causes Klaus much misfortune.
The Death Watch: Bill Betz is in a horrible car accident and his parents fear the worst.
...And in a Far-Off Land!: A modern man is drawn across time and space to help a sorcerer and his people battle the Lafhrds.
ComicInfo.Title: The Turn of the Wheel!; The Death Watch; ...And in a Far-Off Land!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
